In this digital age, do you think modern inventions have made our lives simpler, or more complex and dangerous? Discuss with examples…

After globalisation and liberalisation the entire world became a small village, which leads to innovation,

If one product and technology, which has been out dated in one country, companies are playing strategies to introduce it in another country. In this our country getting new technology, Here new technology means new to our company not to world.

     Digital innovation made our lives simpler because using technology saves our valuable time and energy, It is like a coin on one side we have pro's and in another side we have con's!

Some of the examples are: In apartment we are using lift, Imagine climbing a ten floors building with out a lift, Is it possible ? It is possible, but waste of time and energy.

Cell phone: Imagine the world  with out cell phone we can't even thinking about it, In that way we bound to technology,

computer: Which changed the phase of human being, and phase of economy of so many countries,

CARS: Now companies are manufacturing the cars in such a way that they are eco-friendly in nature, Before it was not like this if any car travels for 5. kms, it is use to produce 1kg of carbon dioxide due to innovation on cars it has been reduced, Like this we have so many products and software's which leads our life's simpler.  

I think using technology is not at all a danger, It is entirely depends up on how a human behaves, we have Different people with different perceptions so how we use technology is in our hands, if we use it for good it's good or if we use it for bad things like: Hacking one's information, some times it may cost life, so be careful not about technology about your behaviour.
